influencer.q: Do I need to be an influencer with many followers?
influencer.a: No! The program is open to everyone - from micro-influencers (1,000+ followers) to established content creators. Quality of audience matters, not just numbers.

where.q: Where can I share my code?
where.a: Anywhere! TikTok, Instagram Stories/Reels, YouTube videos, newsletter, blog, Discord communities, Twitter/X, LinkedIn... You also get a unique link you can share.

timing.q: What if the user doesn't pay immediately?
timing.a: You have a {days}-day attribution window! This means if a user activates your code today and pays in a month, you still get the commission.

privacy.q: Can I see who used my code?
privacy.a: You can see total usage, conversions, and earnings on the dashboard, but you cannot see users' personal data (due to GDPR).

multiple.q: What if I have multiple promo codes?
multiple.a: Currently, we assign one unique code to each ambassador. This makes tracking and payouts easier.

rules.q: Are there any rules or restrictions?
rules.a: Yes - it's forbidden to use your own code, spam, misleading advertising, or violate platform rules. All promotional content must be clearly marked (#ad, #partner). Details in Terms of Service.

customPlan.title: Need a Custom Plan?
customPlan.subtitle: We also offer tailored partnership plans
customPlan.description: Are you interested in a lower commission but recurring monthly payments from every subscription? Or do you have a unique proposal for cooperation?
